com.sun.enterprise.transaction.jts.recovery

Class RecoveryLockFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.enterprise.transaction.jts.recovery.RecoveryLockFile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DelegatedTransactionRecoveryFence, TransactionRecoveryFence

    public class RecoveryLockFile
extends Object
implements TransactionRecoveryFence, DelegatedTransactionRecoveryFence
    This class manages lock file required for delegated recovery.
    Author:
    mvatkina
    See Also:
    in the recovery lock file have the following format: PREFIX INSTANCE_NAME TIMESTAMP Where PREFIX can be one of: - "O" means OWNED by this instance, i.e. non-delegated recovery - "B" means recovered BY the specified instance - "F" means recovered FOR the specified instance TIMESTAMP is the time of the recovery operation
